title: Switch to AHCI after Windows 10 install
contentPreview:
Steps

 1. Start windows 10
    
 2. Select Safe Mode Boot in msconfig
 3. Reboot go into BIOS
 4. Change Setting to AHCI
 5. Continue into Windows (Safe Mode)
 6. Let Windows do its magic
 7. Uncheck Safe Mode in msconfig
 8. Reboot as normal
